programme.title: Around Town
programme.desc: This show is about how to cook clean and healthy food with different types of cooking techniques.

programme.title: Tarka
programme.desc: Join our desi queen Rida Aftab as she takes you on a culinary journey. From chutneys to chargha and desi to a myriad of various fusions, 'Tarka' transforms and spices up your regular everyday dishes.

programme.title: Fusion Food with Saad
programme.desc: Chef Saad provides theme-based patisserie solutions and an insight into savoury and dessert-based baking.

programme.title: Lively Weekend
programme.desc: A platform for bringing forward new culinary talent hosted by the lovely Kiran Khan. With different experts in each programme, weekend mornings will never be the same.

programme.title: Mrs & Mr Ka Kitchen
programme.desc: Symbolizes a couple's shared love for cooking.
